overview: Shooploop is one of the leading mortgage loan companies specializing in loan modification and refinance. With federal loan programs homeowners can modify their current loan interest rate into an affordable-long term program. A free loan consultation with mortgage professionals is another advantage of Shooploop, and Shooploop offers a fabulous reduction on loan rate and doesn’t charge any upfront fees for any reason.
